articles.title: Meetings Held to Vow to Carry Out Tasks for This Year
articles.content:
Meetings Held to Vow to Carry Out Tasks for This Year
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Meetings were held by units in the fields of construction, land management, science, education, public health, sports and literature and arts to vow to carry through the tasks set forth by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					 At the meetings reporters and speakers said that the Supreme Leader's New Year Address is the highly important guidelines giving the firm confidence in the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche and optimism to the Korean people and clearly showing the road ahead of them and the militant banner encouraging the army and people to an all-out onward movement for making fresh leap and innovations.
					
					 They called for smashing the challenges of the hostile forces and conducting an all-people general offensive this year marking the 70th birthday of the DPRK to speed up the building of a powerful socialist country.

articles.title: Korean Fishermen Determined to Make Big Fish Hauls
articles.content:
Korean Fishermen Determined to Make Big Fish Hauls
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The workers and officials of the fishery field of the DPRK have turned out as one in the struggle to implement the tasks set forth by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					 Ko Ton Ha, vice minister of Fisheries, told KCNA:
					
					 The respected Supreme Leader in his New Year Address stressed the need to enhance ship building and repair capacities, launch scientific fishing campaigns, and reenergize aquatic farming.
					
					 His New Year Address serves as an important guideline to be held fast to by the fishery field this year. 
					
					 Dockyards, shipbuilding plants and fishery stations of the country built and set many "Hwanggumhae"-class fishing boats afloat last year. 
					
					 This year, too, we are fully ready for making big fish hauls.
					
					 Fishery units have perfectly established weather forecast, maritime control, fish processing and ship repair systems based on latest science and technology. 
					
					 Measures have been taken at fishery stations in the west coastal areas to prepare various fishing tackles.
					
					 And those in the east coastal areas have been furnished with fishing tackles suited to winter season to wage a scientific fishing campaign.
					
					 True to the Workers' Party of Korea's intention of developing sea fish farming, we will establish cyclic fish farming system in walleye pollack farming, introduce labor- and water-saving fish farming method, reenergize sea fish farming and cage-net fish farming in favorable sections and thus conserve and propagate marine and freshwater resources in every way possible.

articles.title: Iron and Steel Production Increases in DPRK
articles.content:
Iron and Steel Production Increases in DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The field of metallurgical industry of the DPRK is increasing the iron and steel production to meet the need for iron and steel of national economy in the drive to implement the tasks set forth by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address. 
					 The workers of the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex increased the production of Juche iron two times on the New Year's Day. They opened a prospect to carry out the production plan of January ahead of schedule by shortening melting hours with collective innovation and increasing molten iron output per charge.
					
					 The Jaeryong and Unryul mines, leading iron ore producers of the country, are overfulfilling their daily plans.
					
					 After successfully conducting the blasting of 450,000 cubic meters of earth on January 5, the Musan Mining Complex operates large-size excavators and rotary drills at full capacity to carry a lot of iron ore at cutting faces with abundant deposits every day.
					
					 In the New Year, it has overfulfilled its daily production plan.

articles.title: Minju Joson Blasts Japanese Reactionaries' Push for Revival of Militarist Specter
articles.content:
Minju Joson Blasts Japanese Reactionaries' Push for Revival of Militarist Specter
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Japan is reportedly mulling remaking helicopter escort ship Izmo so that it could carry Stealth-capable F-35B of the U.S.
					 It also plans to set up a senior unit commanding those in charge of space and cyber space and electronic warfare, within the Defense Ministry and the "Self-Defense Forces".
					
					 Being examined within the Japanese government now is the idea of ensuring "local production" of long-range cruise missiles capable of attacking enemy bases, and in its extension huge funds have been squandered on the introduction of the U.S.-made defence hardware, at the end of allocating the maximum size defence budget running at an astronomical figure.
					
					 Minju Joson commentary Wednesday denounces this as a dangerous act aimed to realize the ambition for overseas expansion.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The goal sought by Japan, going keen on the ambition for overseas aggression, is turning the country into a military giant and the key goals of the Japanese reactionaries are to acquire capabilities for conducting military operations for aggression in any region and any time at will.
					
					 Japan's overseas aggression is becoming a stark reality.
					
					 It is not hard to guess what horrible disaster mankind will face in case the country opts for reinvasion, a country which has not yet settled its crime-woven past but only been keen on justifying its history of aggression.
					
					 If the Japanese reactionaries are not checked in their push for reviving the militarist specter and for launching overseas aggression, this will have adverse impact on peace and security in Northeast Asia and furthermore the world and on the civilization and development of humankind, and in the end, humankind will be forced to undergo a dreadful disaster again.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Raising High Banner of National Independence
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Raising High Banner of National Independence
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The DPRK will as ever resolve all issues by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation under the unfurled banner of national independence and frustrate the moves of the separatist forces within and without on the strength of national unity, thus making a new history of national reunification, Rodong Sinmun stresses in a commentary Wednesday.
					 National independence is the basis for resolving the national issues and the lifeline of the national reunification movement, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 To adhere to the stand for national independence serves as an important way for settling the issue of the north-south ties.
					
					 Inter-Korean relations are, to all intents and purposes, an internal matter of our nation, which the north and the south should resolve on their own responsibility.
					
					 The foreign forces do not want the military tension of the Korean Peninsula to be defused and the emergence of a reunified power there through improvement of the north-south relations.
					
					 The matter of north-south relations should be settled by the Korean nation itself responsible for it.
					
					 If the north and the south cooperate with each other, rejecting outsiders' intervention, it will be possible to settle all the issues in keeping with the nation's desire and demand and its common interests. When they join efforts on the principle of national independence, there can be no hardship and obstacle impossible to overcome.
					
					 The north and the south authorities should discuss and settle all the issues arising in improving the north-south relations by our nation itself and independently, with pride and honor of the nation and confidence in its strength.
					
					 The DPRK remains steadfast in its stand and will to resolve the north-south issue, the issue of national reunification, independently on the principle of national independence and by the concerted efforts of the nation, rejecting outsiders.

articles.title: Sinister Intention of Japan's Arms Buildup Disclosed
articles.content:
Sinister Intention of Japan's Arms Buildup Disclosed
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries viciously pull up the Democratic People's Republic of Korea over its measures for bolstering the nuclear force.
					 Prime Minister Abe at a lecture in Tokyo expressed the will to continuously pressurize the DPRK and face up to the grave situation, underscoring the need to reinforce practically necessary defense capability to protect the people.
					
					 However, the Japanese people do not fear the "nuclear and missile threats" from the DPRK but feel the imminent danger coming from the authorities' arms buildup under the pretext of it, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in a commentary.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' arms buildup is aimed to lay a military foundation for a warring state. It is their real intention to draw water to their mill by pulling up others.
					
					 The Japanese people should not consider as the tragedy of the past the massacre committed by the U.S. in which Japan became the first country that suffered the nuclear disasters at the end of the Second World War.
					
					 They should clearly see the attempt of the U.S. to drive the Japanese people into a nuclear war by zealously backing and prodding the Japanese reactionary ruling quarters.
					
					 The authorities of Japan should not recklessly gamble on the destiny of its people under the pretence of "protecting" them. They should be prudent and behave themselves, if they truly want the security of the Japanese people.
					
					 If they run amuck depending on the U.S. like a tiger moth, they would not escape a miserable end.

articles.title: U.S. Urged to Seek out Way for Coexisting with DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Urged to Seek out Way for Coexisting with DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The chief of the Tokyo Bureau of the Washington Post said that last year was one when the Democratic People's Republic of Korea registered success in the all-out confrontation with the U.S. and the latter's hostile policy towards the former totally failed, adding that 2017 was a very successful year for the DPRK.
					 Many experts on international affairs contended that the DPRK would further cement its position as a nuclear weapons state this year and the U.S. can not but be susceptible of the reality in which the former had access to nuclear weapons.
					
					 Commenting on the facts, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says that no matter what desperate effort the U.S. may make, it can never save its anachronistic hostile policy towards the DPRK from its total bankruptcy.
					
					 This being a hard reality, the U.S. fails to draw a lesson, the commentary notes and goes on:
					
					 Haley, U.S. ambassador to the United Nations, let out piffle that as long as the DPRK does not abandon its nuclear program, the U.S. can never regard dialogue with the DPRK as important and it can never acknowledge it as dialogue partner as it is possessed of nuclear weapons, talking about "provocation" at the very outset of the new year.
					
					 This is little short of revelation of the intention of the U.S. to persist in the showdown with the DPRK like the previous year.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to rack its brain for seeking out a way for coexistence with the DPRK, a nuclear weapons state both in name and reality, instead of precipitating its ruin with its bluffing and reckless and foolish acts, the commentary concludes.

articles.title: All Efforts on Enhancing Independence and Juche Character of National Economy Urged
articles.content:
All Efforts on Enhancing Independence and Juche Character of National Economy Urged
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- It is the strategic line consistently maintained by the Workers' Party of Korea in building the socialist economy to enhance independence and Juche character of the national economy, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an editorial.
					 It goes on:
					
					 To enhance the degree of independence and Juche character of national economy is a work of vital importance in defending and glorifying most advantageous Korean-style socialism as well as firmly defending our independent life.
					
					 We are required to conduct all-out general offensive for further enhancing the independence and Juche character of the national economy on the basis of the valuable achievements and experience with confidence in sure victory and thus bring about a fresh turn in building a socialist economic power.
					
					 The drive for strengthening independence and Juche character of the national economy is not just a business-like issue but a struggle for ensuring the absolute prestige of the Party Central Committee and the Party policies and defending our socialist ideology and system.
					
					 Everybody has to carry out the militant tasks set forth by the Party under whatever conditions and circumstances, deeply aware that the implementation of the national economy plan for this year precisely leads to enhancing the independence and Juche character of the national economy.
					
					 Let us all wage a dynamic drive for enhancing the independence and Juche character of the national economy, rallied close around the Party and thus let the loud gunfire of victory in building an independent economic power ring out nonstop this year.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Russia
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" was brought out in booklet by Nakhodka Format Publishing House of Russia on Dec. 25 last year to mark the 26th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the 6th anniversary of Kim Jong Un's assumption of the KPA supreme commandership.
					 The work, published on Aug. 25, Juche 102 (2013), deals with the Songun revolutionary leadership feats of Kim Jong Il and the essence and originality of the Songun revolutionary idea and clarifies the tasks for brilliantly accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Songun.

articles.title: Foreign Media Praise Kim Jong Il's Feats
articles.content:
Foreign Media Praise Kim Jong Il's Feats
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Foreign media carried articles such as "Great Life of Peerless Patriot" in the period between Dec. 11 and 19 last year to commemorate the 6th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The Egyptian paper Al Akhbar Al Massay said:
					
					 The life of HE Kim Jong Il was like a leaping flame.
					
					 2011, the last year of his great life, in particular, was the year when he worked harder for the prosperity of the country and the happiness of the people with his iron will and superhuman energy.
					
					 He walked in the van for the building of a powerful socialist country throughout the year 2011.
					
					 The paper introduced the world-startling miracles and innovations wrought one after another in the DPRK in 2011 alone thanks to his devoted efforts.
					
					 An article praising his feats for the cause of national reunification was posted on the website of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy.
					
					 The Cambodian state radio and the website of the Communist Party of Italy, too, reported about the career of Kim Jong Il who had continued his journey of field guidance for the people till the last moments of his life.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Feats Praised by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Feats Praised by Foreign Figures
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries to celebrate the 6th anniversary of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 There were a seminar in Uganda, round-table talks in Ethiopia and book exhibitions and film shows in Nigeria between Dec. 22 and 29 last year.
					
					 Personages of the Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement and the Ugandan National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea said that the KPA has further developed into an invincible army since Kim Jong Un's assumption of its supreme commandership. And they stressed that the achievements made by the Korean people in the struggle to defend the sovereignty of the country would have been unthinkable without the outstanding guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un carrying forward their revolutionary cause.
					
					 Speakers at the round-table talks in Ethiopia said that Kim Jong Un is a great man to be followed by heads of state of all other countries and the strongest leader in the world, adding that they envy the Korean army and people their good fortune of having him as the Supreme Commander.
					
					 Figures of Nigeria noted that HE Kim Jong Un has trained the KPA to be an invincible army and bolstered up the military capability of the country, stressing that the Korean people led by him will surely emerge victorious in the standoff with the U.S. imperialists.

articles.title: DPRK's Stand on Independent Reunification Backed by Nigerian Party
articles.content:
DPRK's Stand on Independent Reunification Backed by Nigerian Party
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- We extend full support to the just and principled stand of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people to smash the moves of the separatist forces at home and abroad and make a new history of national reunification.
					 The People's Progressive Party of Nigeria said this in a statement on Jan. 3. The statement went on:
					
					 We have read with keen attention about the proposals for reunifying the country put forward by HE Kim Jong Un, Supreme Leader of the Korean people, in his New Year Address.
					
					 Those proposals are the most realistic and reasonable.
					
					 We appeal to the world progressive peoples aspiring after justice and progress to lift up their voice of solidarity with the Korean people.

articles.title: Efectuados en muchas unidades mitines de juramento en acato al Mensaje de Ano Nuevo
articles.content:
Efectuados en muchas unidades mitines de juramento en acato al Mensaje de Ano Nuevo
Pyongyang, 10 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar en las unidades de construccion, administracion territorial, ciencia, educacion, salud publica, deportes y literatura y arte los mitines de juramento para materializar las tareas indicadas en el Mensaje del Ano Nuevo del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					En las ocasiones hubo informes e intervenciones. 
					
					Los oradores senalaron que el Mensaje del Ano Nuevo constituye la guia programatica y bandera combativa que hace al pueblo coreano redoblar el optimismo y la fe en la victoria final de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, indica el camino a seguir y llama a todos los militares y civiles del pais a la ofensiva general para lograr nuevos saltos e innovaciones. 
					
					Llamaron a la ofensiva general de todo el pueblo en este ano del aniversario 70 de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea para impulsar la construccion de la potencia socialista frustrando los desafios de las fuerzas hostiles desesperadas.

articles.title: Sector pesquero se moviliza para cumplir tareas presentadas en Mensaje de Ano Nuevo
articles.content:
Sector pesquero se moviliza para cumplir tareas presentadas en Mensaje de Ano Nuevo
Pyongyang, 10 de enero (ACNC) -- Todos los obreros y funcionarios de la rama pesquera de la RPDC se movilizaron en la campana para cumplir las tareas presentadas en el Mensaje del Ano Nuevo del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					El viceministro de Industria Pesquera, Ko Don Ha, dijo a la ACNC como sigue:
					
					  En su Mensaje del Ano Nuevo, el Maximo Dirigente dijo que es preciso elevar la capacidad de construir y reparar barcos, aplicar metodos cientificos en pesca y activar la maricultura.
					
					  Estas instrucciones devienen la guia programatica a ser mantenida en este ano por la rama pesquera.
					
					  En el ano pasado, las fabricas navieras, astilleros y empresas pesqueras construyeron muchos barcos de pesca de la serie "Hwanggumhae".
					
					  Este ano tambien, se preparan en todos los aspectos para la captura de abundantes peces.
					
					  Las unidades pesqueras estan perfeccionando los sistemas de pronostico meteorologico, mando en el mar, procesamiento de pescados y reparacion de barcos, etc.
					
					  En las empresas pesqueras en las zonas litorales del Mar Oeste, se toman las medidas para preparar diversos instrumentos de pesca.
					
					  Los barcos de las empresas pesqueras en las costas del Mar Este dispusieron de suficientes instrumentos de pesca convenientes a las condiciones invernales y salieron al mar donde libran ya la intensa campana de captura cientifica.
					
					  En acato al proposito del Partido del Trabajo de Corea de desarrollar la maricultura, hemos establecido el sistema de reciclaje en la cria de Myongthae y aplicado los metodos economicos en la piscicultura.
					
					Estamos dando auge a la maricultura y la cria de peces en jaulas flotantes con el fin de proteger y multiplicar los recursos maritimos.
